name: The Waiting Room (Billy Krolick)
description:
The Waiting Room

A haunted nursing home. A mysterious past. And life-or-death choices that actually matter. Can you solve the mystery of Back Hall before it's too late?

This is a choice-based interactive fiction horror game. There is no art or sound - just words. And the power of your imagination.

Version 1 tied for 28th in the 2021 Interactive Fiction Competition. This is Version 2, complete with updates and fixes courtesy of comments and reactions from the interactive fiction community. 

Written by Billy Krolick.

Art by Adam Sharp.
